title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to display the group dialog without setting a dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether a dataset is set or not. As per the template requirements, UI validation should not prevent the display of the dialog.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the group dialog section.
3. Leave the dataset field empty.
4. Attempt to display the group dialog.
5. Observe the error message being shown instead of the dialog.
